author: William Horobin
title: Strains Surface at French March in Memory of Slain Jewish Woman
text:
PARISâ€”Tensions over the killing of an elderly Jewish woman spilled over during a march Wednesday in her memory, as leaders of the far-right National Front were met with catcalls when they tried to join the demonstration.
Mireille Knoll was found stabbed to death and burned Friday at her Paris home. French prosecutors on Tuesday pressed preliminary charges against two men for voluntary homicide motivated by the real or supposed religion of the victim, a judicial official said.
